metadata.title: CVE-2022-45884 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in the Linux kernel through 6.0.9.drivers/media/dvb-core/dvbdev.c has a use-after-free, related todvb_register_device dynamically allocating fops.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
